vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Asher living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.17;
son of: Asher (H0836);
brother of: Imnah (H3232), Ishvah (H3438), Beriah (H1283) and Serah (H8294)
Group of yish.vi (יִשְׁוִי "Ishvi" H3440)
§ Jesuites = see Jesui "he will justify me"
the descendants of Jesui ( yish.vi (יִשְׁוִי "Ishvi" H3440)
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Aser; (b)   hijo del rey Saúl; (c)   descendiente de Isví, hijo de Aser
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亦施韋族 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 見 亦施韋
1) 亦施韋的後裔 (03440-2)(民 26:44)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亦施韦族 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 见 亦施韦
1) 亦施韦的后裔 (03440-2)(民 26:44)
